intro.name: Seryozha Okhta
intro.postName: ; I specialize in interface development and design. My portfolio includes work with data visualization, web applications, and educational content.
intro.welcome: I use Vue.js, Node.js, Three.js, and am passionate about 3D and interactive graphics.

educational_videos.title: educational videos
educational_videos.description: This is my video blog, where I publish educational and enlightening videos to share my passion for art and history.

envisioning_information.title: envisioning information
envisioning_information.description: This is my blog, where I explore and experiment with data visualization, interactive and generative design, sharing my thoughts on various techniques and tools.

cgi.title: cgi
cgi.description: This is my digital portfolio, showcasing my work created in Cinema 4D, TouchDesigner, and other software, sometimes for clients and sometimes just for fun.

app_drafts.title: app drafts
app_drafts.description: soon, this place will host the landing page for my application; and eventually, a full website...

webDev.title: Website Development
webDev.description: This section showcases my work in web development, featuring various projects from single-page applications to complex platforms.

project1.title: Smart greenhouses
project1.description: This is a description for Project One.

envisioningInf.title: Envisioning Information
envisioningInf.description: Here, I delve into the art and science of data visualization, presenting my experiments and insights into effective information design.

posts.title: Data Visualization Techniques
posts.summary: An overview of modern data visualization techniques and tools.

posts.title: Interactive Graphics
posts.summary: Exploring the world of interactive graphics and their impact on user experience.

cgi.title: Computer-Generated Imagery
cgi.description: Explore my CGI creations, ranging from 3D modeling and animation to visual effects and interactive installations.

educationalVideos.title: Educational Videos
educationalVideos.description: Here I share my knowledge on various topics through engaging video content.

appDrafts.title: App Drafts
appDrafts.description: A sneak peek into the apps I'm currently developing.

aboutMePage.greeting: Hi there! My name is Seryozha Okhta
aboutMePage.intro: I have experience in editing, typography, 3D graphics and programming. My work primarily revolves around educational content, data visualization, and exploring interactive and generative design techniques

editing.title: Editing
editing.description: I write and edit texts, both my own and others. Additionally, I create scripts for my own video content on the history of art and culture.

interactiveDesign.title: Interactive Design
interactiveDesign.description: I am honing my skills in interactive design, primarily using the TouchDesigner software along with two libraries: Processing 4 (Java) and p5.js (JavaScript).

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: I develop websites both as a designer and a programmer. As a designer, I am proficient in both 3D and 2D software, such as Cinema 4D and After Effects. As a developer, I work with CSS, JavaScript, Java and Python. This enables me to handle projects of any complexity, ranging from 3D modeling to minimalist animation.

design3D.title: 3D Design
design3D.description: Although my focus is primarily on 3D design, I also contemplate how I can apply my knowledge of modeling and texturing in various fields and disciplines. Currently, I mainly utilize my skills in educational videos.

dataVisualization.title: Data Visualization
dataVisualization.description: Recently, I have actively delved into data visualization, ranging from simple statistics to complex representations like wind patterns or migration. I intend to incorporate this expertise into educational content.

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: I am studying several languages: CSS, JavaScript, Java, and Python. I am considering developing my own application, so it is important for me to understand the capabilities offered by each of these languages.
